title: British Working men!  At the meeting of the Executive Council of the German Trade-Unions  on September 10th Mr. Legien, member of the German Reichstag and president of the General Committee of the Trade-Unions of Germany, having submitted his report said according to the "Vossische Zeitung" of September 11th 1918 ...
creator: Legien, Karl  Gompers, Samuel
subject: Krieg 1914 1918
source: Legien, Karl  Gompers, Samuel: British Working men!  At the meeting of the Executive Council of the German Trade-Unions  on September 10th Mr. Legien, member of the German Reichstag and president of the General Committee of the Trade-Unions of Germany, having submitted his report said according to the "Vossische Zeitung" of September 11th 1918 .... Berlin
